channel.title: Errors that make my server lag
channel.description:
Please help
[code] Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Na at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown S at client.fillInStream(client.java:10274) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18721) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java: at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] [code] java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:12443) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18723) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:278) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
What are these are these fixable? I'm using deltascape.

item.title: Errors that make my server lag
item.dc:creator: @iKilem iKilem
item.description:
@iKilem wrote:

The server tried to read data from a client, but failed.

Either your server is bugged, or the client was faulty (server attack maybe?).

Read full topic
item.source: Errors that make my server lag
